name: The Existence Abstract
description: ʇɔɐɹʇsq∀ ǝɔuǝʇsᴉxƎ ǝɥ┴ is a procedurally generated VR shooter with many rogue-like elements. You must dodge lasers, get powerful items and shoot your way through enemies. Enter and explore the A̜͉̗̫̤b͕͇͚͓̖̖̺̱̘s̭̼̞͚t̠̟͎̤̣͔͍̘r̻͈̯̣a̙̲̩͕̗c̜͔̳̠͇͍̩̝ͅt̩͍̖̺̬̟̟.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4690 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 GTX Storage: 2 GB available space
